results.title: Tutorial: Run a parallel workload using the Python API - Azure Batch
results.description: Tutorial: Run a parallel workload with Azure Batch using the Python API Use Azure Batch to run large-scale parallel and high-performance computing (HPC) batch jobs efficiently in Azure. In this tutorial, you convert MP4 media files to MP3 format, in parallel, by using the ffmpeg open-source tool. Retrieve output files You can use the Azure portal.

results.title: Tutorial: Run a parallel workload using the .NET API - Azure Batch
results.description: In this tutorial, you convert MP4 media files to MP3 format, in parallel, by using the ffmpeg open-source tool. This tutorial and the related sample app use the Windows 64-bit full-build version of ffmpeg 4.3.1. To clone the sample app repo with a Git client, use the following command: Navigate to the directory that contains the Visual Studio.
